title: Did Instagram Just Kill Linktree?
description: Meta is finally allowing people to add more links to their Instagram profiles. It’s an existential threat to link-in-bio companies.

title: How ChatGPT—and Bots Like It—Can Spread Malware
description: Generative AI is a tool, which means it can be used by cybercriminals, too. Here’s how to protect yourself.

title: Max Levchin on How AI Will—and Won’t—Shape the Way You Pay
description: We sat down with the CEO of Affirm to talk about the “buy now, pay later” model and just what makes him an “unabashed techno-utopian.”
